KHAOULA CHIHAB : 5IIR G2.

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SecurityService } from './services/security.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'AngularFront'; constructor(public securityService:SecurityService){} onLogout() { this.securityService.kcService.logout( window.location.origin ) } async login(){ await this.securityService.kcService.login({ redirectUri:window.location.origin }) } }
